channel.title: Need help making new npcs, >>>click!<<<
channel.description: Ok...Could anyone give me a step by step guide on how to make npc's? Heres an error i get when i try- [code] Starting fr33sc4p3 Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "4 10 3252 3430 0 3252 3430 3252 3430 1 announcer " at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:1408) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:23) at server.main(server.java:29)[/code] I have no idea what that means. I put this in autospawn .cfg at the very bottem [code] spawn = 410 3252 3430 0 3252 3430 3252 3430 1 announcer [/code] And this in npc handler: (its just an npc that stands and talks, not a shop) [code] if (npcs[i].npcType == 410) { if (misc.random2(50) >= 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "No pjing here or anywhere!"; } }[/code] I saved and compiled...and I got that error up above ^^ any help? A step by step guide would be awesome, and would cover everything. Thanks!

item.title: Need help making new npcs, >>>click!<<<
item.dc:creator: @mage_owner mage_owner
item.description:
@mage_owner wrote:

when u added

spawn = 410     3252    3430    0       3252    3430    3252    3430    1       announcer

did you add it above or below

[ENDOFSPAWNLIST]

Read full topic

item.title: Need help making new npcs, >>>click!<<<
item.dc:creator: @kiev kiev
item.description:
@kiev wrote:

right… your using spaces use TAB

Read full topic

item.title: Need help making new npcs, >>>click!<<<
item.dc:creator: @chewy22 chewy22
item.description:
@chewy22 wrote:

Ok…Could anyone give me a step by step guide on how to make npc’s? Heres an error i get when i try-

Starting fr33sc4p3 Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "4 10 3252 3430 0 3252 3430 3252 3430 1 announcer " at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:1408) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:23) at server.main(server.java:29)
I have no idea what that means. I put this in autospawn .cfg at the very bottem

spawn = 410     3252    3430    0       3252    3430    3252    3430    1       announcer

And this in npc handler: (its just an npc that stands and talks, not a shop)

if (npcs[i].npcType == 410) { if (misc.random2(50) >= 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "No pjing here or anywhere!"; } }
I saved and compiled…and I got that error up above ^^ any help? A step by step guide would be awesome, and would cover everything. Thanks!

Read full topic
